## IPAT

<center>
$I=P\times A\times T$

<p style="font-size:24pt; color:gray">
Where,  
$I$ = Impact   
$P$ = Population  
$A$ = Aflluence  
$T$ = Technology    
</p>
</center>

::: footer
Read more: @ehrlich1971impact, John Holdren [A brief history of "IPAT"](https://mahb.stanford.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/1993-holdre-BRIEF-HISTORY-OF-COMMONER-BATTLE.pdf)
:::

## Summary

- Energy demand is shaped by dynamic factors: populations, GDP, technology, regulation, and human behavior   
- Understanding those drivers will help us learn the magnitude and profile of our demand  
- Load forecast integrates all insights to the show
